definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: For clear skin, stay away from dairy.
sentences.chinese: 为了拥有干净清透的皮肤，远离奶制品。

sentences.english: The herdsmen like to eat beef , mutton and dairy products, and drink black tea and brick tea .
sentences.chinese: 牧民们喜欢吃牛羊肉和奶制品，喜欢喝红茶和砖茶。

sentences.english: Organic milk products by law can’t be produced with bovine growth hormone (BGH).
sentences.chinese: 法律上，有机奶制品不能够添加BGH。

sentences.english: To avoid overfeeding, consider giving your dog low- or reduced-fat dairy products.
sentences.chinese: 为了不至于喂过量，可以考虑使用低脂奶制品。

sentences.english: A：Do you have any dairy or meat products with you?
sentences.chinese: 你是否带有奶制品或肉制品？

sentences.english: It was only the yogurt or cultured milk products with lactic acid bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 就系得酸奶酪同酸奶制品有乳酸菌架咋。

sentences.english: But there are always a number of plant-based substitutes, such as soya milk, well prepared for them.
sentences.chinese: 这些人选择起牛奶和奶制品来可是要加倍小心哦。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: Securely sealed packaging allows various dairy products to be shelf-stable for many months.
sentences.chinese: 严格密封的包装使得各种奶制品能贮存多月。

sentences.english: Cattle are raised mostly for dairy.
sentences.chinese: 养牛大多是为了提供奶制品。

sentences.english: I was angry to my mother, " why don't you help me put my dairy into refrigerator?"
sentences.chinese: 我很气我妈妈，“为什么你不帮我把奶制品放到冰箱？

sentences.english: Apparently, some Chinese manufacturers have added this chemical to their dairy products.
sentences.chinese: 一些中国制造商显然已经在奶制品加入这种化学物质。

sentences.english: Dairy foods contain tryptophan, which is a sleep-promoting substance.
sentences.chinese: 奶制品中含有的色氨酸是种有助增进睡眠的物质。

sentences.english: The first thing I recommend is to take out dairy.
sentences.chinese: 我要建议大家做的第一件事就是不要吃奶制品。

sentences.english: Absolute avoidance of glutens and dairy.
sentences.chinese: 绝对避免面筋和奶制品。

sentences.english: Cheese and other dairy products are loaded with artery-clogging saturated fat and cholesterol.
sentences.chinese: 奶酪和其他奶制品富含堵塞动脉的饱和脂肪和胆固醇。

sentences.english: And further findings claimed shoppers were over-consuming red meat and dairy products.
sentences.chinese: 进一步的发现宣称消费者正在过度消费红肉和奶制品。

definition: general term for milk packaged for the consumer, including long-life (UHT) milk, pasteurized milk and reconstituted milk
